verses.text: God, don’t keep silent. Don’t keep silent, and don’t \w be|strong="H7892"\w* still, God.
\w For|strong="H8252"\w*, behold, your enemies are stirred up. Those who hate you have lifted up their heads.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* conspire \w with|strong="H7218"\w* cunning \w against|strong="H8130"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* people. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* plot \w against|strong="H8130"\w* \w your|strong="H5375"\w* cherished ones.

“\w Come|strong="H5971"\w*,” \w they|strong="H5921"\w* say, “let’s destroy \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w nation|strong="H5971"\w*, \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w* \w may|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* remembered no \w more|strong="H5921"\w*.”

\w For|strong="H8034"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* conspired together \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w mind|strong="H2142"\w*. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* form \w an|strong="H3478"\w* alliance \w against|strong="H3212"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*.
\w The|strong="H5921"\w* tents \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Edom \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Ishmaelites; Moab, \w and|strong="H1285"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Hagrites;
Gebal, Ammon, \w and|strong="H4124"\w* Amalek; Philistia with the inhabitants \w of|strong="H4124"\w* Tyre;

Assyria also \w is|strong="H3427"\w* joined \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H3427"\w*. \w They|strong="H5983"\w* \w have|strong="H5973"\w* helped \w the|strong="H5973"\w* children \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Lot. \qs Selah.\qs*

Do \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H5973"\w* \w did|strong="H1571"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Midian, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Sisera, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Jabin, \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* river Kishon;
\w who|strong="H1992"\w* perished \w at|strong="H6213"\w* Endor, \w who|strong="H1992"\w* became \w as|strong="H6213"\w* dung \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* earth.

Make \w their|strong="H1961"\w* nobles \w like|strong="H1961"\w* Oreb \w and|strong="H1961"\w* Zeeb, yes, all \w their|strong="H1961"\w* princes \w like|strong="H1961"\w* Zebah \w and|strong="H1961"\w* Zalmunna,
\w who|strong="H3605"\w* said, “Let’s \w take|strong="H7896"\w* possession \w of|strong="H3605"\w* God’s pasture lands.”
\w My|strong="H3423"\w* God, make \w them|strong="H3423"\w* like tumbleweed, like chaff before \w the|strong="H3423"\w* wind.

\w As|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fire \w that|strong="H7307"\w* burns \w the|strong="H6440"\w* forest, \w as|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* flame \w that|strong="H7307"\w* \w sets|strong="H7896"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* mountains \w on|strong="H6440"\w* fire,
so pursue \w them|strong="H3857"\w* \w with|strong="H1197"\w* your tempest, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* terrify \w them|strong="H3857"\w* \w with|strong="H1197"\w* your storm.
Fill \w their|strong="H3651"\w* faces \w with|strong="H3651"\w* confusion, \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* may seek \w your|strong="H7291"\w* name, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

Let \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* disappointed \w and|strong="H3068"\w* dismayed forever. Yes, let \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* confounded \w and|strong="H3068"\w* perish;

\w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H5704"\w* may know \w that|strong="H5704"\w* \w you|strong="H5704"\w* alone, whose name is \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, are \w the|strong="H5704"\w* Most High \w over|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* earth.
